external.html: Some icons are from Bootstrap Icons and FontAwesome

nikstudios.li-1: Created the Project Lodestone logo and assets

eternalmodz.li-2: Designed the initial layout to build off of
eternalmodz.li-3: Helped with screen reader and general accessibility testing

openCredits.title: View the list of people that made this site possible

openLodestone.title: Launch Project Lodestone (Lodestone is currently in development and has not been released yet)
openLodestone.tooltip: Lodestone is currently in development and has not been released yet

info.description: The first open-source, all-in-one Minecraft tool, compatible with nearly all platforms, versions, and editions, created by the community for the community.
info.header: Edit, Convert and Transform Minecraft Worlds.
info.name: Project Lodestone

accessible.description:
Accessibility is a big focus.
Things such as screen reader support and proper display scaling are important for allowing broader access to Lodestone.
accessible.title: Accessible

compatible.description:
Will support nearly all editions and versions of Minecraft.
For example, your worlds from Minecraft Classic 0.30-c could be converted to work on Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition.
compatible.title: Compatible

editEverything.description:
With support for NBT*, SNBT*, MCR/MCA*, MCS, ARC*, LOC*, PCK*, VDB/CDB*, FUI*, and more.

*Not available in current build, check Learn more for progress.
editEverything.title: Edit any Minecraft file type

fullControl.description:
You'll be able to edit your player, give yourself items (even some unobtainables), place items in chests, edit entity and block data, and more!

NOTE: This feature is not a priority while the rest of the tool is being made.
fullControl.title: Full control over your world

localized.description:
With support for localizing into any language, Project Lodestone can be used by people all across the world.

Want to help? Check CONTRIBUTING.md in the appropriate GitHub repo to find out how.
localized.title: Localized

worksEverywhere.description: It works as a web-app, meaning any device with a modern browser and an internet connection can use Project Lodestone. (or even offline, using PWA)
worksEverywhere.title: Works "everywhere"

openDocumentation.title: Open documentation for Project Lodestone and technical Minecraft info for all editions.

openLodestone.title: Launch Project Lodestone (Lodestone is currently in development and has not been released yet)
